name: dbt-skills
description: dbt skills for analytics engineering workflows

plugins.name: Using dbt for Analytics Engineering
plugins.description: The core workflow loop when asked to interact with a dbt project. Includes best practices on developing and configuring models, adding tests, and refactoring projects.

plugins.name: Debugging dbt Errors
plugins.description: Work out the root cause of a dbt project's error, e.g. parsing, compilation, or database errors.

plugins.name: Planning dbt Models
plugins.description: Plan dbt models by working backwards from the desired output to understand required data structures and transformations.

plugins.name: Writing Data Tests
plugins.description: Use when adding dbt tests to models, after data discovery is complete, or when reviewing test coverage for warehouse cost optimization.

plugins.name: Discovering Data
plugins.description: Use when exploring unfamiliar data sources, onboarding to a new dbt project, or investigating data quality issues before building models.

plugins.name: Evaluating Impact of a dbt Model Change
plugins.description: Use when modifying an existing dbt model's SQL logic, schema, or columns to understand downstream effects before making changes.

plugins.name: Fetching dbt Docs
plugins.description: Use when fetching dbt documentation, looking up dbt features, or answering questions about dbt Cloud, dbt Core, or the dbt Semantic Layer.

plugins.name: Configuring dbt MCP Server
plugins.description: Use when user wants to set up, configure, or troubleshoot the dbt MCP server for AI tools like Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Cursor, or VS Code.

plugins.name: Troubleshooting dbt Job Errors
plugins.description: Use when a dbt Cloud job fails and you need to diagnose the root cause, especially when error messages are unclear or when intermittent failures occur.

plugins.name: Adding Time Spine for MetricFlow
plugins.description: Use when setting up a dbt project for the semantic layer and time-based metrics are needed, when MetricFlow queries fail due to missing time spine.

plugins.name: Querying dbt Semantic Layer
plugins.description: Use when answering business questions that could be answered by querying data, when dbt MCP tools are available.
